doc:
Bill Zuckert https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Zuckert 0 Bill Zuckert (December 18, 1915 – January 23, 1997) was an American actor. He began his career in 1941 in radio and lent his voice to hundreds of dramas over the next two decades. He served in World War II as a member of the naval construction unit Seabees. He went on to star in television, having many guest and character roles over the next half century, such as playing the sheriff in the Star Trek episode, "Spectre of the Gun". He also made four appearances on TV's Perry Mason as Judge Edward Simpson. He died on January 23, 1997 of pneumonia at the age of 81. Bill_Zuckert ( December_18_,_1915 – January_23_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor . He began his_career in 1941 in radio and lent his_voice to hundreds of dramas over the_next_two_decades . He also made four_appearances on TV 's_Perry_Mason as Judge_Edward_Simpson . He died on January_23_,_1997 of pneumonia at the_age of 81 .
